channel.title: CVE Feed for madfishdigital -- Bulk NoIndex & NoFollow Toolkit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for madfishdigital -- Bulk NoIndex & NoFollow Toolkit

item.title: CVE-2024-8803|2024-09-26T14:55:21.118Z -- madfishdigital -- bulk%20noindex%20%26%20nofollow%20toolkit
item.description: The Bulk NoIndex & NoFollow Toolkit plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of remove_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 2.15. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-8803|2024-09-26T02:03:25.623Z -- madfishdigital -- bulk%20noindex%20%26%20nofollow%20toolkit
item.description: The Bulk NoIndex & NoFollow Toolkit plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of remove_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 2.15. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
